classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, may be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Design.
description: Directed individual creative activity or research. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Design.
label: Special Problems in Design
